name: SublimeLinter3
tagline: A linter framework for Sublime Text 3
body:
[Package Control]: https://sublime.wbond.net/installation

### About SublimeLinter
SublimeLinter is a **framework** for linting code in [Sublime Text 3](http://www.sublimetext.com/3). The actual linting is done by separate Sublime Text 3 plugins, which can be installed via [Package Control][]. SublimeLinter has been designed to provide maximum flexibility and usability for users and maximum simplicity for linter authors.

[Installation](Installation)
[Usage](Usage)
[Configuration](Configuration)
[Writing Linters](Developing)
